title: About us
subtitle: WHAT ARE WE DOING
text-1: We are developing AR NTF to let token owners not just have one of a million versions of digital images but interact with 3D objects in augmented reality.
text-2: We are planning to create a safe space for young artists where they could make digital art objects, sell them for a good price, and put them in augmented reality with Nuzai Network's help.
text-3: Also, 20% of the profit will be donated to fight against animal cruelty - specifically with pharmacies and cosmetics animal testing.
